title: New: Only Real – Get It On
content: Being one of the few UK artists to grace the line-up of Paris’s Pitchfork Festival, there’s a certain weight of expectation upon the shoulders of London’s Only Real. With his first release on LuvLuvLuv Records out next month, an EP titled Days In The City, Niall Galvin draws from the likes of Beastie Boys and Tribe Called Quest, yet merging these influences with a modern, more anthemic style. Get It On, the first track to be taken from the aforementioned EP is a straight out jam, garage-rock riffs mixed with the laidback, intelligent delivery of Galvin. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
